testsuite.name: AuthorSpec

testcase.name: find author by firstname and lastname
test firstname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false
test firstname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true
test firstname all constraints: is false
test lastname all constraints: is false
test lastname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false
test lastname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true

testsuite.system-out: --Output from find author by firstname and lastname-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true-- --Output from valid toString--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from find author by firstname and lastname-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true-- --Output from test firstname all constraints: is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: 123456789012345678901 is false-- --Output from test lastname all constraints: 12345678901234567890 is true-- --Output from valid toString--

testsuite.name: BookSpec

testcase.name: book should have all these attributes
book should display it's title as a result of toString
book title should not longer than 50 characters
book title should not be blank
book isbn must not longer than 10 digit

testsuite.system-out: --Output from book should have all these attributes-- --Output from find book by title-- --Output from book should display it's title as a result of toString-- --Output from book title should not longer than 50 characters-- --Output from book title should not be blank-- --Output from book isbn must not longer than 10 digit--
testsuite.system-err: --Output from book should have all these attributes-- --Output from find book by title-- --Output from book should display it's title as a result of toString-- --Output from book title should not longer than 50 characters-- --Output from book title should not be blank-- --Output from book isbn must not longer than 10 digit--
